fixes.name: Revenue Stability
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the dependent calculated field by translating the row-level arithmetic from Tableau to DAX. Both referenced columns are row-level, so this is implemented as a calculated column.

fixes.name: Stability Tier
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR rev = 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Revenue Stability]
RETURN IF(
    rev > 200, "Stable",
    IF(rev > 50, "Moderate", "Unstable")
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau IF / ELSEIF logic to nested DAX IF statements. The calculation references the row-level calculated field 'Revenue Stability', so this remains a calculated column and returns one of the string literals "Stable", "Moderate", or "Unstable".
